## A1 - Continuous Growth (10 weeks)

```{r}
con_exp_growth <- function(N_initial, r, NT){
  t_cont = 0:NT
  N = N_initial * exp(r*t_cont)
  return(N)
}

r = 0.4
N_initial = 38

N= con_exp_growth()


```
